Correctness.description: Accuracy of the final answer provided by the agents.

Completeness.description: The degree to which all required information is included in the response.

ReasoningTraceability.description: Clarity and traceability of the reasoning process performed by the agents.

SourceReliability.description: Reliability of the sources used by the agents to gather information.

ResponseTime.description: Time taken by the agent system to provide an answer to the question.

DataContaminationControl.description: The system's capability to prevent data leakage or contamination.

ResourceEfficiency.description: How efficiently the system uses computational and informational resources.

Scalability.description: The system's ability to handle a growing amount of information or transactions.

ProcessTransparency.description: Transparency of the internal processes and decision-making within the system.

Adaptability.description: The system's ability to adapt to new, different, or changing requirements.
